name: Solitaire: Decked Out
summary:
The Classic Solitaire you know and love but WITHOUT Ads. 
Unlock themed decks and discover unique winning ceremonies! 
 
 
Beat the game to earn coins and unlock decks and decorative items. 
DECK OUT your play experience with different themes and effects. 
Themes include penguins, flowers, hot dogs, UFOs, and more! 
Let’s get DECKED OUT!
